credit_line: Bequest of Andrew S. Keck, Class of 1924
dimensions: Overall: 12 x 20 x 24 in. (30.5 x 50.8 x 61 cm)
title: The Singing Boy
inscriptions: Incised in original model, cast-through, at proper right thigh: E. Barlach.  Foundry marks, engraved/stamped in wax model, cast-through: H. Noack Berlin Friedenan.  Series marks (engraved/scratched in sculpture): engraved in bronze surface next to signature
